metadata.title: Frontpage
metadata.description: data.norge.no is Norway's official portal for sharing data from Norwegian organizations that you can use for innovation and research.

advancedSearchPrompt.text: Not finding what you're looking for?

errors.generic: An error occurred. Please try again later.
errors.queryTooShort: The query must have at least three characters. Please try again.
errors.queryTooLong: The query cannot have more than 255 characters. Please try again.

prompt.label: Ask our AI about data from over 125 organizations and 8000 datasets:

responses.noResults: Unfortunately, I didn't find any relevant datasets. Please try another query.
responses.resultsFound: I found {{num}} datasets that might be relevant:

list: Number of Teslas sold in Norway in 2022
Which areas in Norway are protected?
Which goods does Norway export the most?
What do traffic patterns look like in Oslo?
Which research projects receive funding in Norway?
How much forest does Norway have?
How is digitalization progressing in Norway?
Which technologies are most used in Norway?

tooltip.disclaimer: Do not enter personal information in the search field.
tooltip.label: About AI Search
tooltip.readMoreLinkText: Read more about the AI Search here
tooltip.text: Our AI Search makes it easy to find datasets using natural language without needing to know specific dataset names, technical terms, or formats. Please note that the AI Search may be both incomplete and contain errors.

shareDataBanner.content: Follow {{link}} and share your data with the rest of the country.
shareDataBanner.title: Share your data
